pkgmetadata.longdescription: VMWare Workstation is a virtual machine which can be used to install other operating systems in a virtual environment to run on top of Gentoo.

use.flag: Install VIX. The VIX API allows you to write programs and scripts that automate virtual machine operations, and run programs or manipulate files within guest operating systems.

Install wrapper into /opt/vmware/bin/vm{ware,player} which runs vmware under the auspicies of the /usr/bin/padsp wrapper as a temporary workaround for problems with >=media-libs/alsa-lib-1.0.28 segfaulting). This has not been carefully tested, actual results of using vmware's alsa support in this configuration are unknown as of September 2014.
